content.raw:
Can you check if the `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` variable is set? It should show up when you do this:

`printenv | grep "GAZEBO"`

If you get nothing, be sure to source the setup file and try again:

`source /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh`

Let us know how it goes.

As for Gazebo Answers, has that happened recently? Can I have your profile url? It should be something like this:

http://answers.gazebosim.org/users/1019/chapulina/
